content: Great article, it’s definitely a great definition of data engineering. I’d recommend this article as well, it does have advice for novices on the field: https://blog.insightdatascience.com/preparing-for-the-transition-to-data-engineering-bfb39d327316. What you all think about the Lambda Architecture? BTW, thank you for the advice at the Python meetup yesterday! I found the Ralph Kimball’s book (The Data Warehouse Toolkit: The Definitive Guide to Dimensional) .
